name: GRID RUN
description:
GRID RUN is an endless arcade game where you navigate the grid avoiding obstacles and collecting gems.

The game is made for Android and Windows, you can download it on the Play Store and below (single executable).

Control the ball with 'A' and 'D' or '←' and '→' or using the mouse. Collect and unlock new balls and designs.

Help me add some music! Do you know of some royalty free indie music that would fit the game? Maybe different tracks for each design.

Feel free to suggest more ball designs and general improvements.

You can find me at goncalomb.com or @goncalomb.

Thanks for playing.
